attributes.review: When I opened the app it started to glitch and kicked me out several times. The app made my battery run down in record time, and caused problems to arise in other apps on my phone. I believe there is now a bug on my phone because of this app. I downloaded the app to learn more about our president, but I am now unable to do that because I can't get into the app for more than a few seconds before it kicks me out. In conclusion I feel this app is absolutely horrid and I won't be recommending it to anyone. Don't download this app if you don't want to buy a new phone because of bugs.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible app
